STANFORD UNIVERSITY
STANFORD, CALIFORNIA
INSTITUTE FOR COMMUNICATION RESEARCH
29 September, 1961
Professor Samuel L. Becker
Division of Television, Radio, Film
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
It is always nice to hear from you. Thanks especially for
the note on statistics. It doesn't sound like a thing I would do,
but I'll look up the article and the calculations and see whether
I should hang my head or argue. I appreciate very much your writing
about it.
But let me hasten to respond to your note about the breakfast.
Are you sure I'm on that committee? I have no record of anyone asking
me to be, or of accepting. And whereas I would do most anything for
NAEB or you, still on October 24 I am supposed to be speaking to the
Unesco National Commission's Africa conference in Boston.
Can I be of any help at long distance? I don't know exactly
what that committee does, but with a vigorous chairman it ought to
have a vigorous program. Good luckl
With best wishes, I am
Sincerely yours
--A
MTbur Schramm
Director
